content.html: Modifying a wallet is possible after clicking on the 'Manage Wallets' button provided on the top right corner of the wallets page.
The wallets will display an edit icon next to each wallet and now, we can click on the wallet to start editing them.
The modify wallet page is shown, with the possibility to edit the name of the wallet and the currency.

1

Edit the wallet's entries.

2

Click on the 'Save' button to modify the wallet.

3

The view is changed to the 'Choose wallet' page.
Editing primary wallet
When the primary wallet is edited (identified by a star), the possibility of changing the name is removed, there by allowing the possibility of changing only the currency.
Choosing currency
A dropdown will open once you click on the down arrow next to the currency, where you can see all the currencies with wallet and the ones without wallet.
You can start typing the currency of your preference and click on the key down / key up arrow to toggle between currencies without wallet section.
Choosing currencies with wallet
Multiple wallets cannot be created for the same currency.
Search terms
When no result is shown then it is advisbale to change the search terms to something simpler.
No result is shown in the currencies without wallet as the 'Indian Rupee' already exists as a wallet option.
Cancel modification
Cancelling the modification will redirect the page to the 'Choose wallet' page.
Done modification
Clicking on the 'Done' button would change to the 'Choose wallets' page.
